name: Mark Welsh
description: I work hard and play hard. what i am looking for is someone who is honest who accepts me for me. someone who we can be in a room together and not talk and just be happy that we are together. i want someone loyal. i want someone who enjoys life.I truly believe in communicating effectively and considering one another..don’t have time for deceitful women… I want to meet a marriage minded woman,to develop a serious relationship. Love and family are two areas representing for me a big interest. I want to create a relationship where the main accent is done on honesty,sincerity and respect.
